abstract: Nokia introduces two smartphones, first fruits of its alliance with Microsoft; phones are Lumia 800 and Lumia 710.
snippet: The Lumia models, presented Wednesday, are the first fruits of the phone maker’s alliance with the American software giant.
lead_paragraph: The Lumia models, presented Wednesday, are the first fruits of the phone maker’s alliance with the American software giant.

headline.main: With New Smartphones, High Hopes for Nokia and Microsoft Union
headline.print_headline: With New Smartphones, High Hopes for Nokia and Microsoft Union
